name: SCRCHR
description: Use this command to get or put a single display character or attribute on the screen.
syntax: SCRCHR AT column,row DISP display_field ATRB attribute_field GET/SET

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: The column position on the screen for the character. The upper left corner of the active window (or the full screen) is column 1, row 1.

parameters.name: row
parameters.description: The row position on the screen for the character. The upper left corner of the active window (or the full screen) is column 1, row 1.

parameters.name: display_field
parameters.description: The name of the field that either holds the character to be displayed (set) or will receive the character currently on the screen (get). This must be a 1 character alpha (type A) field.

parameters.name: attribute_field
parameters.description: The name of the field that either holds the color attribute to be displayed (set) or will receive the color attribute currently on the screen (get). This must be a 1 character alpha (type A) field.
